# Blender addon for import mesh from CSV file

Use triangle lists to create an object.

## Samples

### Quad
- Triangles: 2
- Vertices: 4
- Indices: 6
```
-10.00, -10.00, 0.00
-10.00, 10.00, 0.00
10.00, -10.00, 0.00
10.00, -10.00, 0.00
-10.00, 10.00, 0.00
10.00, 10.00, 0.00
```

### Cube
- Triangles: 12
- Vertices: 8
- Indices: 36
```
-10.00, -10.00002,  9.99998
-10.00,  9.99998,  10.00002
10.00, -10.00002,  9.99998
10.00, -10.00002,  9.99998
-10.00,  9.99998,  10.00002
10.00,  9.99998,  10.00002
-10.00,  9.99998,  10.00002
10.00,  10.00002, -9.99998
10.00,  9.99998,  10.00002
10.00,  10.00002, -9.99998
-10.00,  9.99998,  10.00002
-10.00,  10.00002, -9.99998
-10.00, -10.00002,  9.99998
-10.00,  10.00002, -9.99998
-10.00,  9.99998,  10.00002

-10.00, -10.00002,  9.99998

-10.00, -9.99998, -10.00002
-10.00, -10.00002,  9.99998
```
